title: I just played bruiser Yi...
body: And I have never felt like more of a scumbag.

replies.body: Hmm you should take a break from being a scumbag and play Juggernaut Fiora ... Oh wait.
honestly no you can play fiora and not even know what the hell vitals are and still 1v1 a mass majority

Fiora:


I hate bruiser YI, it is insane how he can 1 vs 4

Fed master yi can 1 vs 5 without any tank item. Stop raping this champion with such builds and get outta here with guinsoos and bloodthirsters on him, 99% play Yi wrong, but he is so trick pony even a brainless will score nice kda with him.

> [{quoted}](name=Pink Chocolade ,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UfAZQk4M,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-07T17:52:47.640+0000)
>
> Fed master yi can 1 vs 5 without any tank item. Stop raping this champion with such builds and get outta here with guinsoos and bloodthirsters on him, 99% play Yi wrong, but he is so trick pony even a brainless will score nice kda with him.

Are you aware your sentence absolutely made no sense?
Made absolutely no sense, and no, no it didn't.

> [{quoted}](name=Cherysse,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UfAZQk4M,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-07T17:18:54.567+0000)
>
> I hate bruiser YI, it is insane how he can 1 vs 4

id rather watch a janna get a penta very slowly and desperately
rather then watch a yi using so much "skill" to penta

Who's the 4?

{{champion:51}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:21}} ?
anything sated+titanit sated+guinso sated+botrk is canc3r reloaded TM
{{item:3931}} is caner

Boycott Yi because bruiser Yi is cheap. Actually any Yi is cheap. What other character has an invincibility Q?

Stupid toon. Stupid game design.
not invincible "untargetable"

I used to feel bad with Warmog's Heart active on Soraka.
Because of some champs now, I now feel nothing.
Just heal.
Everyone.
Forever.
Too bad I can't undo 2300 damage done in 0.93 seconds.
Clearly you never played AP Yi.

I guess Master Yi need a nerf.

He can deal so much damages with only Devourer and Guinsoo, he deal physic, magic and TRUE damages, got his ult for say "Fuck you" when you try to slow him, and his stupid Q making him invincible when you try ton controle him.

Worst nightmare on the game for me actually.
You actually didn't just play bruiser yi. You don't have a master yi game for quite sometime. Fishing for up votes lol

> [{quoted}](name=Kerchner12,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UfAZQk4M,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-03-08T00:23:07.975+0000)
>
> You actually didn't just play bruiser yi. You don't have a master yi game for quite sometime. Fishing for up votes lol

He played a game as him 3 days ago and went 18/7/4. That's not exactly "just played Yi" but he has played him recently, it's not just baseless upvote farming.

That game was actually quite funny. Their fed champ was bruiser Ekko and he was giving my team hell (even though i bursted him in 2 seconds) at one point i typed to Ekko "Assassin's building tank sure is fun right" (tbh tanky Ekko is a lot less BS).

All i can say is that poor poor {{champion:22}}
he wanted dat ashe, poor boy is jealous of tryndamere
there is a thing, its called a normal game and it wont show up on someones match history if you dont have them Friended
lol{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

And i just played 1st time Lee Sin. 
Now i understand why nobody who can play this game dont give a fuck about Yi.

> [{quoted}](name=Quadle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UfAZQk4M,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-03-07T17:16:45.591+0000)
>
> And I have never felt like more of a scumbag.

try playing shyvana and be a complete scummer, and 15 mins earlier than yi
She can at least be slowed and kited after her jump, Yi just sticks to your ass all day long.

> [{quoted}](name=TheVishual,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UfAZQk4M,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2016-03-08T12:25:25.467+0000)
>
> try playing shyvana and be a complete scummer, and 15 mins earlier than yi

Lol, Shyvana is mediocre at best when compared to bruiser Yi.

question is shen super popular in this patch? because all these auto attack based champs are building tanky

well shen does more damage to you if you're tanky, negates your auto attacks, makes you auto attack HIM (the tank) and has the potential to be always there to counter your mid game aggression with a fat shield. Just saying he should be super popular RN
Malphite is still more popular than him as far as I have seen.
I played bruiser yi in late season 5. Everyone thought I was crazy, I was already the meta.
You abused the fact that about 0.0000001% of players know how to close out games? Go you.
this reminds me, of when ap yi roamed the fields.

Play Illaoi on TT.
The hardest part is keeping her passive on CD - since the entire map is close quarters.

You dropped your hat, sir:

https://qph.is.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-e7cf6a2f6f19e651c7d4b6b26dedb555?convert_to_webp=true
"balanced"  I've never knew such b.s. by a company since playing league of legends for 5 years.

play full AD/AS/Crit Yi

you'll never feel more useless for the entire match, and that if u managed to get enough gold to buy said build

"Bruiser Yi", also known as "building Yi how anyone who hasn't been hiveminded by League players to think carries shouldn't build defensive items would build Yi."

Melee carries need to not die instantly in melee range, who fucking knew?
